title: Where is your God now?
text: "Where is Your God Now?" is a popular catchphrase associated with various interweb sightings (images, videos, sites, etc) that defy the logic of human understanding to the point one can no longer resist but to ask him/herself: Does God Really Exist?

title: Мама мыла раму
text: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, brute iriure accusata ne mea. Eos suavitate referrentur ad, te duo agam libris qualisque, utroque quaestio accommodare no qui.
